metadata.title: RZ/V2M: Board purchased from Chip One Stop does not work.

sections.content:
Question:
Inserted an SD card with an operating program into the board purchased from Chip One Stop and turned it on, but it would not start up.
Answer:
The board at the time of purchase has a test boot program written on it. Therefore, the RZ/V2M Linux Package
Please refer to Section 7 of the RZ/V2M Linux Package Start-Up Guide to write the boot program.
Suitable Products
RZ/V2M
Inserted an SD card with an operating program into the board purchased from Chip One Stop and turned it on, but it would not start up.
